fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: The title of the page
fieldDefs.name: title

computedFields.name: url_path
computedFields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: Site title
fieldDefs.name: title

fieldDefs.label: Base URL
fieldDefs.description: The base URL of this site. Useful for sites hosted under specific path, e.g.: https://www.example.com/my-site/
fieldDefs.name: path_prefix

fieldDefs.label: Domain
fieldDefs.description: The domain of your site, including the protocol, e.g. https://mysite.com/
fieldDefs.name: domain

fieldDefs.label: Favicon
fieldDefs.description: A square icon that represents your website
fieldDefs.name: favicon

fieldDefs.label: Color Palette
fieldDefs.description: The color palette of the site
fieldDefs.name: palette

fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: The title of the page
fieldDefs.name: title

fieldDefs.label: Sections
fieldDefs.description: Page sections
fieldDefs.name: sections

computedFields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: The title of the page
fieldDefs.name: title

fieldDefs.label: Subtitle
fieldDefs.description: The text shown below the page title
fieldDefs.name: subtitle

fieldDefs.label: Image
fieldDefs.description: The image shown below the page title
fieldDefs.name: image

fieldDefs.label: Image Alt Text
fieldDefs.description: The alt text of the image
fieldDefs.name: image_alt

fieldDefs.label: Page content
fieldDefs.description: Page content
fieldDefs.name: content

computedFields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: The title of the post
fieldDefs.name: title

fieldDefs.label: Subtitle
fieldDefs.description: The text shown just below the title or the featured image
fieldDefs.name: subtitle

fieldDefs.description: Post author
fieldDefs.name: author

fieldDefs.label: Excerpt
fieldDefs.description: The excerpt of the post displayed in the blog feed
fieldDefs.name: excerpt

fieldDefs.label: Image (single post)
fieldDefs.description: The image shown below the title
fieldDefs.name: image

fieldDefs.label: Image alt text (single post)
fieldDefs.description: The alt text of the featured image
fieldDefs.name: image_alt

fieldDefs.label: Image (blog feed)
fieldDefs.description: The image shown in the blog feed
fieldDefs.name: thumb_image

fieldDefs.label: Image alt text (blog feed)
fieldDefs.description: The alt text of the blog feed image
fieldDefs.name: thumb_image_alt

fieldDefs.label: Page content
fieldDefs.description: Page content
fieldDefs.name: content

computedFields.name: url_path
computedFields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: The page title that goes into the <title> tag
fieldDefs.name: title

fieldDefs.label: Description
fieldDefs.description: The page description that goes into the <meta name="description"> tag
fieldDefs.name: description

fieldDefs.label: Robots
fieldDefs.description: The items that go into the <meta name="robots"> tag
fieldDefs.name: robots

fieldDefs.label: Extra
fieldDefs.description: Additional definition for specific meta tags such as open-graph, twitter, etc.
fieldDefs.name: extra

fieldDefs.label: Logo
fieldDefs.description: The logo image displayed in the header (if no logo added, the site title is displayed instead)
fieldDefs.name: logo_img

fieldDefs.label: Logo Alt Text
fieldDefs.description: The alt text of the logo image
fieldDefs.name: logo_img_alt

fieldDefs.label: Enable Navigation
fieldDefs.description: Display the navigation menu bar in the header
fieldDefs.name: has_nav

fieldDefs.label: Navigation Links
fieldDefs.description: List of navigation links
fieldDefs.name: nav_links

fieldDefs.label: Icon position
fieldDefs.description: The position of the icon relative to text
fieldDefs.name: icon_position

fieldDefs.label: Open in new window
fieldDefs.description: Should the link open a new tab
fieldDefs.name: new_window

fieldDefs.label: No follow
fieldDefs.description: Add rel="nofollow" attribute to the link
fieldDefs.name: no_follow

fieldDefs.label: Sections
fieldDefs.description: Footer sections
fieldDefs.name: sections

fieldDefs.label: Enable Horizontal Navigation
fieldDefs.description: Display the horizontal navigation menu bar in the footer
fieldDefs.name: has_nav

fieldDefs.label: Horizontal Navigation Links
fieldDefs.description: List of horizontal navigation links
fieldDefs.name: nav_links

fieldDefs.label: Footer Content
fieldDefs.description: The copyright text displayed in the footer
fieldDefs.name: content

fieldDefs.label: Links
fieldDefs.description: A list of links displayed in the footer
fieldDefs.name: links

fieldDefs.label: Title
fieldDefs.description: The title of the section
fieldDefs.name: title

fieldDefs.label: Section type
fieldDefs.description: Needed for sourcebit for polymorphic list types
fieldDefs.name: type

fieldDefs.label: Content
fieldDefs.description: The content of the section, appears above the form
fieldDefs.name: content

fieldDefs.label: Form ID
fieldDefs.description: A unique identifier of the form, must not contain whitespace
fieldDefs.name: form_id

fieldDefs.label: Form Action
fieldDefs.description: The path of your custom "success" page, if you want to replace the default success message.
fieldDefs.name: form_action

fieldDefs.label: Hide labels of the form fields?
fieldDefs.name: hide_labels

fieldDefs.label: Type
fieldDefs.description: Type of the form field
fieldDefs.name: input_type

fieldDefs.label: Name
fieldDefs.description: The name of the field, submitted with the form
fieldDefs.name: name

fieldDefs.label: Label
fieldDefs.description: The caption of the field, shown above the field input
fieldDefs.name: label

fieldDefs.label: Placeholder text or default value
fieldDefs.description: The placeholder for textual field types or default option for select field
fieldDefs.name: default_value

fieldDefs.label: Options
fieldDefs.description: The list of options for select field
fieldDefs.name: options
